entries.name: file_name
entries.desc: The file name of this input method, usually given during initialization.

entries.name: new(file)
entries.desc: Creates a new input method object

entries.name: encoding()
entries.desc: The external encoding for standard input.

entries.name: eof?()
entries.desc: Whether the end of this input method has been reached, returns true if there is no more data to read.

entries.name: gets()
entries.desc: Reads the next line from this input method.
